EmailTemplate.name: POV.10-26-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry Summit Comes to Berlin
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Week of October 26, 2015 <http://berlin2015.cfsummit.com/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-10-26-15> First European Cloud Foundry Summit Comes to Berlin As cloud com­put­ing, mo­bile, and in­ter­net of things technologies impact industries on a global scale, the Cloud Foundry Summit is coming to Europe for the first time. Taking place in Berlin on November 2 and 3, 2015, the event is directed to Cloud Foundry experts and novices alike, as well as industry leaders looking to share how Cloud Foundry has transformed their businesses. Following the Cloud Foundry Sum­mit North America, which brought together 1500 de­vel­op­ers, op­er­a­tors, and man­agers, the first Cloud Foundry Summit Europe is expected to net over 600 attendees. READ MORE <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/first-european-cloud-foundry-summit-comes-to-berlin?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-10-26-15> Pivotal Cloud Foundry A Look At Cloud Foundry's Service Updates October 26, 2015 During the Cloud Foundry Summit 2015, Pivotal’s David Sabeti and IBM’s Michael Maximilien reviewed the latest Cloud Foundry Service Broker Updates. These new features offer new opportunities to provision and customize services which were previously difficult to implement. Recently, the Cloud Foundry Service Broker API was updated to version 2.7, and some of the experimental API features went from experimental to GA. Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/a-look-at-cloud-foundrys-service-broker-updates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-10-26-15> A Look At Pivotal Labs In Sydney October 28, 2015 A new office for Pivotal Labs, the agile development arm of Pivotal, has just opened in the beautiful city of Sydney, Australia. We have a candid chat with Labs Director, Lawrence Crowther, about the Labs setup, why Silicon Valley has been relying on Pivotal Labs for nearly 20 years and what we do to help customers get amazing results. Tune In <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-perspectives/features/a-look-at-pivotal-labs-in-sydney?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-10-26-15> Webinar How Data Science is Preventing College Dropouts and Advancing Student Success November 17, 2015 In this webinar, two Pivotal data scientists will discuss a recent collaborative project with a top university, in which many data sources were used to build a 360-degree profile of student activity on campus and help predict student success. Read More <https://event.on24.com/eventRegistration/EventLobbyServlet?target=reg20.jsp&partnerref=Pivotal&eventid=1080873&sessionid=1&key=494EF9E67799B2760FF98F34F3B960EA&regTag=&sourcepage=register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=dsc-webinar-10-26-15>
